snippet.title: Cannon Father Release Trailer
snippet.description:
It's every retired-pirate-father's nightmare; a never ending onslaught of enemies from your past, hellbent on destroying what little remains of your family. An explosive adventure where you’ll find yourself shooting, disintegrating, and flattening invaders all while treasure hunting, buying upgrades, and protect your island home.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1326660/Cannon_Father
Follow the development here: https://twoscoopstudio.itch.io/cannon-father
